document.full_text: the tampa bay lightning were fighting to keep their season going during wednesday's game 6 against the bruins. so it makes sense the team decided to paint the waters of tampa bay a different shade of blue.
document.title: do or dye victory for the lightning
lines_and_colors: the tampa bay lightning were fighting to keep their season going during wednesday's game 6 against the bruins. so it makes sense the team decided to paint the waters of tampa bay a different shade of blue.
